DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multi-center , single-blinded , non-randomized clinical trial . Enrolled subject receive two Ulthera® treatment peri-orbital peri-oral region , treatment provide 30 day apart . Follow-up visit occur 90 180 day follow treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , immediately post-treatment , follow-up visit .
